targets.expr:
topk(100,
  sum by (node_name, node_country_emoji) (
    increase(remnawave_node_inbound_upload_bytes[$__range])
  )
  +
  sum by (node_name, node_country_emoji) (
    increase(remnawave_node_inbound_download_bytes[$__range])
  )
  +
  sum by (node_name, node_country_emoji) (
    increase(remnawave_node_outbound_upload_bytes[$__range])
  )
  +
  sum by (node_name, node_country_emoji) (
    increase(remnawave_node_outbound_download_bytes[$__range])
  )
)
